src

Class GameClass

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Canvas
        • src.GameClass
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class GameClass
extends java.awt.Canvas
implements java.lang.Runnable
    the main game engine that will hande drawing and loading of sounds and images, handles keyboard input. in order to use this class put "import src.GameClass;" without the quotes at the top of every class file
    See Also:
